a.title: Learn more about School District of Brown Deer
a.span: Go to School District of Brown Deer Information

p.span: The School District of Brown Deer aspires to be a world-class educational community that honors diversity, promotes high expectations for life-long learning and leadership, preparing all students to reach their fullest potential.
Together with our families and community, we will inspire students to be passionate learners, creative thinkers, and innovative leaders who enrich our world.

div.p: New! The School District of Brown Deer has a new helpful guide to navigate through our website. All yellow boxes on the guide have links to direct you to the page you are looking for. read more about Brown Deer Website Helpful Hints
